entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

RAIN
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
